verses.verse: Rejoice <S%H7442><s%> in the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> O you righteous: <S%H6662><s%> for praise <S%H8416><s%> is comely <S%H5000><s%> for the upright. <S%H3477><s%>
Praise <S%H3034><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> with harp: <S%H3658><s%> sing <S%H2167><s%> to him with the psaltery <S%H5035><s%> and an instrument of ten <S%H6218><s%> strings.
Sing <S%H7891><s%> to him a new <S%H2319><s%> song; <S%H7892><s%> play <S%H5059><s%> skillfully <S%H3190><s%> with a loud noise. <S%H8643><s%>
For the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> is right; <S%H3477><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> his works <S%H4639><s%> are done in truth. <S%H530><s%>
He loves <S%H157><s%> righteousness <S%H6666><s%> and judgment: <S%H4941><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> is full <S%H4390><s%> of the goodness <S%H2617><s%> of the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

By the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> were the heavens <S%H8064><s%> made; <S%H6213><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the host <S%H6635><s%> of them by the breath <S%H7307><s%> of his mouth. <S%H6310><s%>
He gathers <S%H3664><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%> together as an heap: <S%H5067><s%> he lays <S%H5414><s%> up the depth <S%H8415><s%> in storehouses. <S%H214><s%>

Let all <S%H3605><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> fear <S%H3372><s%> the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> let all <S%H3605><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the world <S%H8398><s%> stand <S%H1481><s%> in awe <S%H1481><s%> of him.
For he spoke, <S%H559><s%> and it was done; he commanded, <S%H6680><s%> and it stood <S%H5975><s%> fast.

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> brings <S%H6331><s%> the counsel <S%H6098><s%> of the heathen <S%H1471><s%> to nothing: <S%H6331><s%> he makes the devices <S%H4284><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> of none <S%H5106><s%> effect. <S%H5106><s%>
The counsel <S%H6098><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> stands <S%H5975><s%> for ever, <S%H5769><s%> the thoughts <S%H4284><s%> of his heart <S%H3820><s%> to all generations. <S%H1755><s%>

Blessed <S%H835><s%> is the nation <S%H1471><s%> whose <S%H834><s%> God <S%H430><s%> is the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> and the people <S%H5971><s%> whom he has chosen <S%H970><s%> for his own inheritance. <S%H5159><s%>
The LORD <S%H3068><s%> looks <S%H5027><s%> from heaven; <S%H8064><s%> he beholds <S%H7200><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of men. <S%H120><s%>
From the place <S%H4349><s%> of his habitation <S%H3427><s%> he looks <S%H7688><s%> on all <S%H3605><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the earth. <S%H776><s%>
He fashions <S%H3335><s%> their hearts <S%H3820><s%> alike; <S%H3162><s%> he considers <S%H995><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> their works. <S%H4639><s%>

There is no <S%H369><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> saved <S%H3467><s%> by the multitude <S%H7230><s%> of an host: <S%H2428><s%> a mighty <S%H1368><s%> man is not delivered <S%H5337><s%> by much <S%H7230><s%> strength. <S%H3581><s%>
An horse <S%H5483><s%> is a vain <S%H8267><s%> thing for safety: <S%H8668><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall he deliver <S%H4422><s%> any by his great <S%H7230><s%> strength. <S%H2428><s%>
Behold, <S%H2009><s%> the eye <S%H5869><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> is on them that fear <S%H3373><s%> him, on them that hope <S%H3176><s%> in his mercy; <S%H2617><s%>
To deliver <S%H5337><s%> their soul <S%H5315><s%> from death, <S%H4194><s%> and to keep them alive <S%H2421><s%> in famine. <S%H7458><s%>
Our soul <S%H5315><s%> waits <S%H2442><s%> for the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> he is our help <S%H5828><s%> and our shield. <S%H4043><s%>
For our heart <S%H3820><s%> shall rejoice <S%H8055><s%> in him, because <S%H3588><s%> we have trusted <S%H982><s%> in his holy <S%H6944><s%> name. <S%H8034><s%>
Let your mercy, <S%H2617><s%> O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> be on us, according as we hope <S%H3176><s%> in you.
